thread.title: announces a handful of new advertising services coming to YouTube
thread.title_full: Google announces a handful of new advertising services coming to YouTube - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: announces a handful of new advertising services coming to YouTube
text: Google today has announced several new services that will enhance the advertising capabilities of YouTube. First off, the company has announced Shopping ads for YouTube. These ads will allow advertisers to show a click-to-buy ad within partner videos on YouTube. Advertisers only pay when a user clicks on the ad, similar to Shopping ads on […] »
